    • Uses of Grid in ohha.puzzlecrafter.auxiliary

      Methods in ohha.puzzlecrafter.auxiliary with parameters of type Grid 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List<CellCoordinate> Neighbours.cardinals(Grid g, CellCoordinate c)
      Returns a list of the coordinates of the cells directly adjacent to the cell indicated by the given coordinate.
      static List<CellCoordinate> Neighbours.diagonals(Grid grid, CellCoordinate c)
      Returns a list of the coordinates of the cells that are diagonal neighbours to the cell indicated by the given coordinate.
      static boolean IsDuplicated.onColumn(Grid grid, CellCoordinate c)
      Returns whether a cell's value is unique on its column.
      static boolean IsDuplicated.onRegion(Grid grid, Partition partition, CellCoordinate c)
      Returns whether a cell's value is unique on its region.
      static boolean IsDuplicated.onRow(Grid grid, CellCoordinate c)
      Returns whether a cell's value is unique on its row.
      static List<CellCoordinate> Neighbours.surrounding(Grid grid, CellCoordinate c)
      Returns a list of the coordinates of the cells that touch by corners the cell indicated by the given coordinate.
